changeSet.author: jhipster
changeSet.script: db.Things.insert( { "_id" : "system", "password" : "", "first_name": "", "last_name": "System", "email": "", "activated": "true", "lang_key": "en", "created_by": "system", "created_date": new Date(), "authorities": [{"_id": "ROLE_ADMIN"}, {"_id": "ROLE_USER"}] }); db.Things.insert( { "_id" : "anonymousUser", "password" : "", "first_name": "Anonymous", "last_name": "User", "email": "", "activated": "true", "lang_key": "en", "created_by": "system", "created_date": new Date(), "authorities": [] });
